title: Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares (NASDAQ:MSFU) Declares $0.31 Dividend
text:
Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares (NASDAQ:MSFU - Get Free Report) announced a dividend on Monday, March 18th, NASDAQ reports. Shareholders of record on Wednesday, March 20th will be given a dividend of 0.3053 per share on Tuesday, March 26th. The ex-dividend date is Tuesday, March 19th. Get MSFU alerts:Sign UpDirexion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares Price Performance MSFU stock traded up $0.35 during midday trading on Tuesday, hitting $46.10. 117,623 shares of the company's stock were exchanged, compared to its average volume of 231,487. The business has a 50-day simple moving average of $43.96 and a two-hundred day simple moving average of $39.01. Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares has a 1-year low of $25.92 and a 1-year high of $47.48. Institutional Inflows and Outflows Hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently modified their holdings of the company. UBS Group AG purchased a new position in Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares in the fourth quarter valued at $186,000. B. Riley Wealth Advisors Inc. purchased a new stake in Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares during the 1st quarter worth about $229,000. Flow Traders U.S. LLC purchased a new stake in Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares during the 1st quarter worth about $298,000. Finally, Susquehanna International Group LLP purchased a new stake in Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares during the 1st quarter worth about $829,000. Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares Company Profile (Get Free Report) The Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X Shares ETF (MSFU) is an exchange-traded fund that is based on the Microsoft Corporation index. The fund provides 1.5x leveraged exposure, less fees and expenses, to the daily price movement for shares of Microsoft stock. MSFU was launched on Sep 7, 2022 and is managed by Direxion.See AlsoFive stocks we like better than Direxion Daily MSFT Bull 1.5X SharesWhat is the S&P/TSX Index?Growing Twice as Fast as Tesla, XPeng is a BuyAre These Liquid Natural Gas Stocks Ready For An Upside Bounce?4 Stocks Building Long-Term Value for Shareholders Unveiling The Power Of VWAP: A Key Indicator For TradersFedEx Stock Has Analysts Upgrading in Bulk, a Sudden Discount This instant news alert was generated by narrative science technology and financial data from MarketBeat in order to provide readers with the fastest and most accurate reporting.
